job.title: Junior Data Center Engineer/Linux
job.description:
A SaaS company in Center City Philadelphia is looking to bring on a Junior Datacenter Engineer to join the team of about six other Engineers. This environment is primarily a Linux (CentOS/Debian) shop, so you should have experience troubleshooting hardware, managing Servers (upgrades), scripting with Bash, SAN platforms, Virtualization, and more.

This position is perfect for someone looking to grow into more of a Linux Engineer or Cloud Engineer. This company offers a ton of growth, training, ability to work on new technology, excellent work life balance and full benefits.

Required Skills & Experience
  • At least 1+ year in IT
  • Production experience with Linux Servers and Hardware
  • Virtualization including VMware and any Cloud platforms such as GCP, AWS or Azure
  • SAN - EMC, NetApp, etc.
  • Excellent troubleshooting skills
  • Scripting Bash and Python

What You Will Be Doing

Tech Breakdown
  • 100% Datacenter

Daily Responsibilities
  • 100% Hands on

The Offer
  • Competitive Salary: Up to $80K/year, DOE


You Will Receive The Following Benefits
  • Full Medical, Dental and Vision
  • Matching 401k
  • Excellent PTO
  • Growth/training

Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
